name: Destiny awaits...(Beta 2) Released
description:
This game is a parkour game were you go through Loads of stages Think you are a parkour master? The game is in high development and has updates very often...If you think the game is to easy at the moment wait 1 week till beta 3!!! sorry there are many bugs :(

Beta 3 will include

-2 more levels

-50 More GT Play Area

-downloadable

Current version includes...

-3 levels

-150 GT Play area

-New music
